mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.F_ZLBH,b.F_NYBH,b.F_YQBH FROM bes_branch_conf_alert a, bes_branch_conf b WHERE a.active = '0' AND a.F_ZLBH = b.F_ZLBH AND b.F_YQBH = #{parkId}
select a.*,b.F_SBID from bes_branch_conf_parameter a,bes_ammeter b where F_ALERTID = #{F_ALERTID} and a.F_AMMSYS_NAME = b.F_SYS_NAME ORDER BY F_SORTNO
select F_NYMC from bes_energy_type WHERE F_NYBH = #{F_NYBH}
SELECT F_DATA FROM bes_original_data WHERE F_DBSYS_NAME = #{F_AMMSYS_NAME} and F_DNBH = #{F_ELEDNBH} ORDER BY F_CJSJ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT F_EMAIL, F_PHONE FROM es_user WHERE F_YQBH = #{parkid} OR F_YQBH = 'admin'
select F_ALERT_TYPE from bes_branch_alert_type where F_ZLBH =#{id}

(select a.F_ALERTID,a.F_AMMSYS_NAME,c.F_NYMC ,d.F_ZLBH,d.F_ALERTNAME,d.F_OPERATOR,d.F_ALERTGRADE,d.F_RANGETYPE,d.F_NOMORE,d.F_NOLESS,d.F_EQUAL,d.F_ACTIVE,d.F_ALERTYPEID F_TYPE,e.F_YQBH from bes_branch_conf_parameter a ,bes_electric_params b,bes_energy_type c ,bes_branch_conf_alert d,bes_branch_conf e,bes_ammeter f where f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_sys_name_old} and a.F_ELEDNBH = b.F_DNBH and b.F_nyBH = c.F_NYBH and a.F_ALERTID = d.F_ID and d.F_ZLBH = e.F_ZLBH and a.F_AMMSYS_NAME = f.F_SYS_NAME) UNION ( select a.F_ALERTID,a.F_AMMSYS_NAME,c.F_NYMC ,d.F_ZLBH,d.F_ALERTNAME,d.F_OPERATOR,d.F_ALERTGRADE,d.F_RANGETYPE,d.F_NOMORE,d.F_NOLESS,d.F_EQUAL,d.F_ACTIVE,d.F_ALERTYPEID F_TYPE,e.F_YQBH from bes_branch_conf_parameter a ,bes_electric_params b,bes_energy_type c ,bes_branch_conf_alert d,bes_branch_conf e,bes_ammeter f where f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD = #{f_sys_name_old} and a.F_ELEDNBH = b.F_DNBH and b.F_nyBH = c.F_NYBH and a.F_ALERTID = d.F_ID and d.F_ZLBH = e.F_ZLBH and a.F_AMMSYS_NAME = f.F_SYS_NAME )
select a.*,b.* from bes_electric_coll_rlgl a,bes_electric_params b where a.F_CJFABH = (SELECT F_CJFABH FROM bes_ammeter where f_sbid = #{meterID}) and a.F_NHBH = b.F_DNBH
select F_PERCENTAGE from bes_ammeter where F_SBID = #{meterID}
select a.*,b.F_NODE_TABLE from bes_sbpz_struct a ,bes_sbtree_nodetype b where F_ID = #{pointId} and a.F_TYPE = b.F_NODE_TYPE
select F_SYS_NAME_OLD from bes_sbpz_struct where F_ID = #{pointId}
SELECT F_DATA FROM bes_calculate_data WHERE F_DBSYS_NAME = #{f_ammsys_name} ORDER BY F_CJSJ DESC LIMIT 1

(select a.F_ALERTID,a.F_AMMSYS_NAME,c.F_NYMC ,d.F_ZLBH,d.F_ALERTNAME,d.F_OPERATOR,d.F_ALERTGRADE,d.F_RANGETYPE,d.F_NOMORE,d.F_NOLESS,d.F_EQUAL,d.F_ACTIVE,d.F_ALERTYPEID,e.F_YQBH from bes_branch_conf_parameter a ,bes_electric_params b,bes_energy_type c ,bes_branch_conf_alert d,bes_branch_conf e,bes_ammeter f where f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD = f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD and a.F_ELEDNBH = b.F_DNBH and b.F_nyBH = c.F_NYBH and a.F_ALERTID = d.F_ID and d.F_ZLBH = e.F_ZLBH and a.F_AMMSYS_NAME = f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD) UNION ( select a.F_ALERTID,a.F_AMMSYS_NAME,c.F_NYMC ,d.F_ZLBH,d.F_ALERTNAME,d.F_OPERATOR,d.F_ALERTGRADE,d.F_RANGETYPE,d.F_NOMORE,d.F_NOLESS,d.F_EQUAL,d.F_ACTIVE,d.F_ALERTYPEID,e.F_YQBH from bes_branch_conf_parameter a ,bes_electric_params b,bes_energy_type c ,bes_branch_conf_alert d,bes_branch_conf e,bes_ammeter f where f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD = f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD and a.F_ELEDNBH = b.F_DNBH and b.F_nyBH = c.F_NYBH and a.F_ALERTID = d.F_ID and d.F_ZLBH = e.F_ZLBH and a.F_AMMSYS_NAME = f.F_SYS_NAME_OLD )
select a.* from bes_branch_conf_parameter a,bes_ammeter b where a.F_AMMSYS_NAME = b.F_SYS_NAME_OLD ORDER BY F_SORTNO
